SELECT menu.*, ( SELECT CASE WHEN count( 1 ) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM blade_menu WHERE parent_id = menu.id AND is_deleted = 0 ) AS "has_children" FROM blade_menu menu WHERE menu.is_deleted = 0
and menu.parent_id = #{param1}
and menu.name like concat('%', #{param.name},'%')
and menu.code like concat('%', #{param.code},'%')
and menu.alias like concat('%', #{param.alias},'%')
ORDER BY menu.sort
